divs: sighting detailsi was outside smoking a cigarette and observed lights in the sky and a strange feeling occurred.i am ridiculed at work because of my belief in the paranormal and considered by many to be an outcast,whatever,those people [cms\tg\pd]. i looked up and witnessed an uncharacteristic brightness in the sky, unusual for the time of year, especially this coastal county.i remained still and looking skyward,when a vision appeared before me.now,it was not entirely clear, and due to this country's blazen epidemic of false sightings, i think they know not to be so clear as before,but i have seen many aircraft here in the marine corps base so it took me aback when i observed what appeared to be a disk in the sky with unnecessarily bright lights.i then felt awkward and wrong,possibly due to the fact that the military teaches mindless obedience and faith in a nonexistent entity known as courage, also because it was late and i was tired. i didnt say anything before because i figured theyd tap my phone and computer, but i couldn't care less now because they are about to do legal damage to my record, so [cms\tg\pd] them.i can tell you this, there are secrets here, and if you talk to the right people at the right time, you can get some decent leads.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around March 31st 2009
